metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29390 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: libjpeg-turbo version 2.0.90 has a heap-based buffer over-read (2 bytes) in decompress_smooth_data in jdcoefct.c.

notes.Note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8 mdeslaur> the libjpeg package is an unrelated codebase ccdm94> according to upstream, this issue was introduced with commit 6d91e95, on version 2.1 beta1[6(b)].

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
